verses.name: 1 Kings 16:1
verses.text: Then the word of the Lord came to Jehu the son of Hanani against Baasha, saying,

verses.name: 1 Kings 16:2
verses.text: Forasmuch as I exalted thee out of the dust, and made thee prince over my people Israel; and thou hast walked in the way of Jeroboam, and hast made my people Israel to sin, to provoke me to anger with their sins;

verses.name: 1 Kings 16:3
verses.text: Behold, I will take away the posterity of Baasha, and the posterity of his house; and will make thy house like the house of Jeroboam the son of Nebat.
